message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to let it go for $9,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I am willing to pay $8,500 for it.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,200. It's a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $8,800.
I see you're willing to meet me halfway, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit on this deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.
You're getting close, Bob! I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to meet you at $9,200, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. Let's meet in the middle at $9,100.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $9,050 for the product.
You're really close now, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to make one last concession and meet you at $9,100. This is my final offer, so let me know if you're interested.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $9,075 for the product.
